text: Juan Diego Antonio Li Naranjo (born 16 February 1995), commonly known as Juan Diego Li, is a Peruvian football player who most recently played for UTC Cajamarca. ==Club career== In August 2016, Li joined Vejle Boldklub. However, after failing to make an appearance for the Danish side, he joined Alianza Lima of his native Peru in December of the same year. ==Career statistics== ===Club=== {| class="wikitable" style="text-align: center" |- !rowspan="2"|Club !rowspan="2"|Season !colspan="3"|League !colspan="2"|Cup !colspan="2"|Continental !colspan="2"|Other !colspan="2"|Total |- !Division !Apps !Goals !Apps !Goals !Apps !Goals !Apps !Goals !Apps !Goals |- |FBC Melgar (loan) |2014 |rowspan="3"|Torneo Descentralizado |1||0||0||0||colspan="2"|–||0||0||1||0 |- |Alianza Lima |2015 |6||0||6Appearances in the Torneo del Inca||0||colspan="2"|–||0||0||12||0 |- |UTC |2018 |4||0||0||0||colspan="2"|–||0||0||4||0 |- ! colspan="3" |Career total !11!!0!!6!!0!!0!!0!!0!!0!!17!!0 |} ;Notes ==References== Category:1995 births Category:Living people Category:Peruvian footballers Category:Sportspeople from Lima Category:FBC Melgar footballers Category:Universidad San Martín footballers Category:Vejle Boldklub players Category:Association football defenders Category:Footballers at the 2015 Pan American Games Category:Peruvian people of Chinese descent
